headline: Mizuho Boosts Allstate (ALL) PT to $255 as New Insurance Models Confirm Outperform Rating
summary: The Allstate Corporation (NYSE:ALL) is one of the best large cap value stocks to buy in 2026. On January 14, Mizuho raised the firm’s price target on Allstate to $255 from $254, while maintaining an Outperform rating on the shares.
